Streamline Utilities: Your Partner in Bridging the Digital Divide with BEAD Funding

What is BEAD?

The Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment (BEAD) Program is a historic opportunity to bring high-speed internet to every corner of America. With $42 billion in funding, it's the largest investment in broadband ever, and it's poised to transform lives in underserved communities.

Who is Streamline Utilities and How Can We Help?

We are a passionate team of infrastructure experts with a proven track record of building networks, connections, and partnerships across the nation. We offer turnkey solutions in utility, electrical & fiber optic infrastructure, wireless communications, engineering, and technology services.

Our 30+ years of experience in the utility industry make us the ideal partner for navigating the complexities of BEAD funding. We have the knowledge, resources, and nationwide presence to help you connect with unserved and underserved communities, bridging the digital divide and creating a brighter future for all.

Ready to Take the Next Step?

Let Streamline Utilities be your trusted guide on this transformative journey. Together, we can build a more connected, equitable, and prosperous future for everyone
